text: Looks like the content tab got a nice update. Much more organized. Thanks, HubSpot. :sprocket:
If you send me your portal IDs, I can ungate you :slightly_smiling_face:
really! OMG, I've been seeing this in client portals and waiting for INBOUND to happen so we could have it, thinking it might be coming out for everyone :wink:
Yes! We're really excited about it--I personally think it's significantly better than before :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi folks! Just wanted to give a final heads up that tomorrow around midday EDT, we're going to be releasing our first ever new major version of a default module. This first release is for the default Divider module, *<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/divider-module-v1|more info on our changelog here>*. The current version of the divider module (the one you can use today) is what we're calling "v0" and the version we're releasing tomorrow is called "v1". When the release happens, only net new portals created will get v1 of the divider. All existing portals will continue to have v0. Existing portals will _not_ be able to get access to v1. Any questions, let me know!
any clue if being a “developer” will enable developer mode in the page editor globally?
